arts.ttl: Why Virgil van Dijk Wasn’t Sent Off For Richarlison Elbow
arts.sum: The incident occurred early in the match - and an explanation has now emerged for what Van Dijk avoided a red card.

arts.ttl: “Arsenal will buy him” – Sky Sports man tips Tottenham hero to join Arsenal
arts.sum: Sky Sports pundit Paul Merson has tipped former Tottenham striker Harry Kane to join Arsenal in a controversial move at the end of the season. Kane left Tottenham to join Bayern Munich and even though his individual form for the German giants has been great, he has failed to win silverware with the Bundesliga side. arts.ttl: Arne Slot loved Virgil van Dijk moment that summed up 'intense' Liverpool performance vs Tottenham
arts.sum: Virgil van Dijk wasn't about to let his Liverpool team-mates ease off as Tottenham were swept aside by Liverpool

arts.ttl: Was this new low for 'abject' Spurs - and what happened to 'Ange-ball'?
arts.sum: Tottenham's loss to Liverpool was described as "abject", "damaging" and "a disgrace" - so what next for Ange Postecoglou and Spurs?

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou bemoans missed opportunity after Tottenham crash out of Carabao Cup - as Spurs boss admits Liverpool 'were too good for us'
arts.sum: LEWIS STEELE AT ANFIELD: Postecoglou expressed his frustration and 'disappointment' after his side were beaten 4-0 by Liverpool in their Carabao Cup semi-final second leg.

arts.ttl: Sky pundit makes Tottenham U-turn with heavy criticism with Ange Postecoglou message
arts.sum: "Not having one shot on target in the semi-final second-leg, when you're trying to change the course of your history - I feel sorry for those young players. Jamie Redknapp has criticised Tottenham Hotspur's performance as they slumped to a 4-0 defeat in the Carabao Cup semi-final against Liverpool.
Tottenham head coach Ange Postecoglou has described external criticism of his team as "irrelevant" following their 4-1 aggregate defeat to Liverpool in the Carabao Cup semifinals.

arts.ttl: Liverpool 4-0 Tottenham (4-1 agg): Player ratings as Reds overturn deficit to reach Carabao Cup final
arts.sum: It took Liverpool just over half an hour to erase Tottenham's narrow advantage from the first leg, with Cody Gakpo firing past Antonin Kinsky after Mohamed Salah's cross made it all the way to the far post. Son Heung-min smacked the crossbar from a narrow angle, but an unmarked Virgil van Dijk further compounded Tottenham's misery late on by glancing in Conor Bradley's in-swinging corner.

arts.ttl: Jamie Redknapp SLAMS Son Heung-min and questions his credentials as Tottenham captain after Carabao Cup humbling against Liverpool
arts.sum: The north London side crashed out of the Carabao Cup semi-final after a 4-0 loss at Anfield saw the Reds clinch a 4-1 aggregate victory and book a place at Wembley in March.

arts.ttl: Liverpool 4-0 Spurs: Postecoglou hit with another injury setback; sets unwanted first as Tottenham manager
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou sets an unwanted first as Tottenham Hotspur manager on the same night his team was struck down with another injury.
